scripts.update-wf: rm -rf writers-friend && mkdir writers-friend && cd ../writers-friend && npm run build-prod && cp -r dist/writers-friend/* ../davidcalhoun.github.io/writers-friend*
scripts.update-hover: rm -rf react-hover-slideshow && mkdir react-hover-slideshow && cd ../react-hover-slideshow && npm run build-storybook && cp -r .storybook-out/* ../davidcalhoun.github.io/react-hover-slideshow/
